description: I'm 23 years old and I live in Turin, Italy
bachelor: In 2021 I got my bachelor's degree in Computer Science Engineering at the Università degli Studi di Palermo.
master: I'm currently studying to get a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics at the Politecnico di Torino.
resume: I'm really interested in Hi Tech and IT. I love playing videogames since I was a child. These passions have led me to study and work in different fields in order to look for new technlogies and programming languages.
soft-skills: Working on personal and university projects, I have acquired different soft skills such as teamwork, communication, problem solving, team leading, time management and self-motivation.
programming-skills: Thanks to my studies, I have acquired different programming skills such as Assembly, C, Rust, Python, Java, Javascript, SQL. I'm also very interested in web development and mobile development using React and Flutter.
innovation-day: In 2020 I participated in the EIT HEALTH's Innovation Day at the Università degli Studi di Palermo, where I won the first place in the category of 'Best Idea'. I also participated in the EIT HEALTH's European Challenge, where my team and me reached top 10.
